traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The elven scout has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put them to sleep.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.desc: The elven scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elven scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 +2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 +2) piercing damage.
